translatedContent: # 🛡️ 检测工程入门包
![Discord](https://img.shields.io/discord/1332993005359202345?logo=discord)

originContent: > **An opinionated list of essential resources for aspiring Detection Engineers.**
translatedContent: > **一份针对有志成为检测工程师的精选必备资源清单。**

originContent: The goal of this starter pack is to provide a curated selection of resources to help you get started in detection engineering without feeling overwhelmed. This list is based on personal experience with various detection technologies. Hope it helps! 🚀
translatedContent: 本入门包的目标是提供一份精选资源，帮助你在检测工程领域起步而不至于感到不知所措。此列表基于个人对各种检测技术的经验。希望对你有帮助！🚀
### 💬 **加入 Discord**

originContent: [Connect with others to discuss all things threat detection and security engineering.](https://discord.gg/HAVyDtUunu)
translatedContent: [与他人交流，讨论所有威胁检测和安全工程相关话题。](https://discord.gg/HAVyDtUunu)
## 📖 目录 <!-- omit in toc -->
- [🔍 了解攻击者技术](#-了解攻击者技术)
- [📜 认识检测规则](#-认识检测规则)
- [🛠️ 自己动手尝试](#-自己动手尝试)
- [🔒 终端检测](#-终端检测)
- [🌐 网络检测](#-网络检测)
- [📂 文件内容检测](#-文件内容检测)
- [📊 SIEM（安全信息与事件管理）](#-siem安全信息与事件管理)
- [⚙️ SOAR（安全编排自动化与响应）](#-soar安全编排自动化与响应)
- [🎭 对手模拟](#-对手模拟)
- [📚 有用的概念](#-有用的概念)
- [🧪 实验室与培训](#-实验室与培训)
- [📖 进一步阅读与有趣项目](#-进一步阅读与有趣项目)
- [🌟 精彩列表](#-精彩列表)
## 🔍 了解攻击者技术
> **了解攻击者如何实现他们的目标。**
- [MITRE ATT&CK](https://attack.mitre.org/) - 对手战术和技术的第一知识库。

originContent: - [MITRE ATT&CK](https://attack.mitre.org/) - The #1 knowledge base of adversary tactics and techniques.
translatedContent: - [Top 10 ATT&CK Techniques](https://top-attack-techniques.mitre-engenuity.org/) - 一个可自定义页面，用于显示最常见的ATT&CK技术。

originContent: - [Top 10 ATT&CK Techniques](https://top-attack-techniques.mitre-engenuity.org/) - A customisable page to display the most common ATT&CK techniques.
translatedContent: - [Hacking the Cloud](https://hackingthe.cloud/) - 一系列用于理解云端攻击技术的资源。

originContent: - [Hacking the Cloud](https://hackingthe.cloud/) - A collection of resources for understanding cloud-focused attack techniques.
translatedContent: - [The DFIR Report](https://thedfirreport.com/) - 用防御者视角分析和描述的真实事件报告。个人最爱。

originContent: - [The DFIR Report](https://thedfirreport.com/) - Real-world incidents analysed and described with a defender's mindset. A personal favourite.

translatedContent: ## 📜 了解检测规则
> **展示检测如何构建和应用的示例仓库。**

originContent: > **Example repositories showcasing how detections are structured and applied.**

translatedContent: - [Sigma](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma) - 通用的检测签名格式。
- [Splunk Detection Rules](https://research.splunk.com/detections/) - Splunk的检测规则集合。

originContent: - [Splunk Detection Rules](https://research.splunk.com/detections/) - A collection of detection rules for Splunk.
translatedContent: - [Elastic Detection Rules](https://github.com/elastic/detection-rules/tree/main/rules) - Elastic的检测规则集合。

originContent: - [Elastic Detection Rules](https://github.com/elastic/detection-rules/tree/main/rules) - A collection of detection rules for Elastic.
translatedContent: - [Detection Studio](https://detection.studio/) - 将Sigma规则转换为其他检测规则语法。

originContent: - [Detection Studio](https://detection.studio/) - Convert Sigma rules to other detection rule syntaxes.

translatedContent: ## 🛠️ 自己动手试试
> **可玩的工具，均为开源或含免费层。**

originContent: > **Tools to play with that are either open source or have a free-tier element.**

translatedContent: #### 🔒 端点检测
- [Aurora](https://www.nextron-systems.com/aurora/) - 一个能运行Sigma规则的代理。加载你的Sigma规则，从事件日志创建警报。

originContent: - [Aurora](https://www.nextron-systems.com/aurora/) - An agent that can run Sigma rules. Load up your Sigma rules, and create alerts from your event logs.
translatedContent: - [Velociraptor](https://github.com/Velocidex/velociraptor) - 一个数字取证和事件响应工具，增强端点的可视化。

originContent: - [Velociraptor](https://github.com/Velocidex/velociraptor) - A digital forensic and incident response tool that enhances your visibility into your endpoints.
translatedContent: - [Falco](https://github.com/falcosecurity/falco) - 一个云原生运行时安全工具，用于检测容器内的威胁。

originContent: - [Falco](https://github.com/falcosecurity/falco) - A cloud-native runtime security tool to detect threats within containers.
translatedContent: - [Sysmon](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/sysinternals/downloads/sysmon) - 一个简单的Windows系统监视器。
- [Osquery](https://www.osquery.io/) - 一个操作系统检测框架。
#### 🌐 网络检测
- [Suricata](https://suricata.io/) - 用于检测网络流量中可疑活动的检测规则。

originContent: - [Suricata](https://suricata.io/) - Detection rules designed to interrogate network traffic for suspicious activity.

translatedContent: #### 📂 文件内容检测
- [YARA](https://github.com/virustotal/yara) - 用于识别和分类恶意软件样本的检测规则。

originContent: - [YARA](https://github.com/virustotal/yara) - Detection rules for identifying and classifying malware samples.

translatedContent: #### 📊 SIEM (安全信息和事件管理)
- [Elastic Stack (ELK)](https://www.elastic.co/elastic-stack) - 一套用于搜索、日志记录和分析的工具集。

originContent: - [Elastic Stack (ELK)](https://www.elastic.co/elastic-stack) - A suite of tools for search, logging, and analytics.
translatedContent: - [Wazuh](https://wazuh.com/) - 一个开源的安全监控平台。
#### ⚙️ SOAR（安全编排自动化与响应）
- [Tines](https://www.tines.com/) - 一个面向安全团队的无代码自动化平台。非常适合快速自动化各种任务。提供免费套餐。

originContent: - [Tines](https://www.tines.com/) - A no-code automation platform for security teams. Great for automating anything, quickly. Has a free tier.

translatedContent: #### 🎭 对手模拟
- [Adversary Emulation Library](https://github.com/center-for-threat-informed-defense/adversary_emulation_library) - 一套对手模拟计划库。

originContent: - [Adversary Emulation Library](https://github.com/center-for-threat-informed-defense/adversary_emulation_library) - A library of adversary emulation plans.
translatedContent: - [MITRE Caldera](https://github.com/mitre/caldera) - 一个自动化的对手模拟平台。
- [Stratus Red Team](https://github.com/DataDog/stratus-red-team) - 一个用于云环境对手模拟的工具。

originContent: - [Stratus Red Team](https://github.com/DataDog/stratus-red-team) - A tool for adversary emulation in the cloud.
translatedContent: - [Atomic Red Team](https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team) - 一套简单的对手模拟测试库。

originContent: - [Atomic Red Team](https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team) - A library of simple adversary emulation tests.
translatedContent: - [TTPForge](https://github.com/facebookincubator/TTPForge) - 一个用于创建和管理TTP（战术、技术和程序）的工具。

originContent: - [TTPForge](https://github.com/facebookincubator/TTPForge) - A tool for creating and managing TTPs.

translatedContent: ## 📚 有用的概念
- [Detection Engineering Behavior Maturity Model](https://www.elastic.co/security-labs/elastic-releases-debmm) - Elastic提出的一个结构化方法，帮助安全团队持续提升其流程和行为的成熟度。

originContent: - [Detection Engineering Behavior Maturity Model](https://www.elastic.co/security-labs/elastic-releases-debmm) - a structured approach for security teams to consistently mature their processes and behaviors from Elastic.
translatedContent: - [Alerting Detection Strategy (ADS) Framework](https://github.com/palantir/alerting-detection-strategy-framework/blob/master/ADS-Framework.md) - Palantir提供的一个简单框架，用于构建检测策略。

originContent: - [Alerting Detection Strategy (ADS) Framework](https://github.com/palantir/alerting-detection-strategy-framework/blob/master/ADS-Framework.md) - A simple framework for building detection strategies from Palantir.
translatedContent: - [Summiting the Pyramid](https://center-for-threat-informed-defense.github.io/summiting-the-pyramid/?utm_source=ctidio&utm_medium=shortlink) - 基于“痛苦金字塔”，该作品定义了实现强健检测的真正含义。

originContent: - [Summiting the Pyramid](https://center-for-threat-informed-defense.github.io/summiting-the-pyramid/?utm_source=ctidio&utm_medium=shortlink) - Building on the 'pyramid of pain', this work defines what it really means to have a robust detection.
translatedContent: - [Capability Abstraction](https://posts.specterops.io/capability-abstraction-fbeaeeb26384) - 我最喜欢的文章之一——SpecterOps的《能力抽象》。探讨了与上述“攀登金字塔”项目类似的概念。

originContent: - [Capability Abstraction](https://posts.specterops.io/capability-abstraction-fbeaeeb26384) - One of my favourite articles - 'Capability Abstraction' from SpecterOps. Explores similar concepts to the above 'summiting the pyramid' project.

translatedContent: ## 🧪 实验室与培训
- [Blue Team Labs Online](https://blueteamlabs.online/) - 一个提供实战蓝队培训的平台。

originContent: - [Blue Team Labs Online](https://blueteamlabs.online/) - A platform for hands-on blue team training.
translatedContent: - [ACE Responder](https://www.aceresponder.com/) - 一个为现有网络防御者及新手设计的逼真沉浸式平台。

originContent: - [ACE Responder](https://www.aceresponder.com/) - A realistic and immersive platform for existing cyber defenders and newcomers alike.

translatedContent: ## 📖 延伸阅读及有趣项目
> **我精心挑选的启发性材料。**

originContent: > **A handpicked selection of materials that have inspired me.**

translatedContent: - [Detections.ai](https://detections.ai/) - 一个由AI驱动并由社区推动的平台，用于分享和改进检测规则。使用邀请码 `StarterPack`。

originContent: - [Detections.ai](https://detections.ai/) - An AI-powered and community-driven platform to share & improve detection rules. Use invite code `StarterPack`.
translatedContent: - [ACEResponder](https://x.com/ACEResponder) - 一个在X平台上分享攻击者技术的视觉账号。

originContent: - [ACEResponder](https://x.com/ACEResponder) - An X account sharing attacker techniques visually.
- [Detect FYI](https://detect.fyi/) - A Medium publication focused solely on detection engineering.
translatedContent: - [Detect FYI](https://detect.fyi/) - 一个专注于检测工程的Medium出版物。

originContent: - [Detection Engineering Weekly](https://www.detectionengineering.net/) - A weekly newsletter on Detection Engineering.
translatedContent: - [Detection Engineering Weekly](https://www.detectionengineering.net/) - 一份关于检测工程的每周通讯。

originContent: - [EDR Telemetry](https://www.edr-telemetry.com/) - A resource that compares popular EDR tools with one another.
translatedContent: - [EDR Telemetry](https://www.edr-telemetry.com/) - 一个对比流行EDR工具的资源。
- [MITRE ATLAS](https://atlas.mitre.org/matrices/ATLAS) - ATT&CK，但用于人工智能。

originContent: - [Prioritizing Detection Engineering](https://medium.com/starting-up-security/prioritizing-detection-engineering-b60b46d55051) - A well-written piece from Ryan McGeehan on how to think about prioritising your detection engineering efforts.
translatedContent: - [Prioritizing Detection Engineering](https://medium.com/starting-up-security/prioritizing-detection-engineering-b60b46d55051) - Ryan McGeehan撰写的一篇关于如何优先考虑检测工程工作的优秀文章。

originContent: - [How Google Does It](https://cloud.google.com/transform/how-google-does-it-modernizing-threat-detection) - How Google does threat detection at massive scale.
translatedContent: - [How Google Does It](https://cloud.google.com/transform/how-google-does-it-modernizing-threat-detection) - 谷歌如何在大规模上进行威胁检测。

originContent: - Notable security vendor blogs for defenders:
translatedContent: - 著名安全厂商的防御者博客：
- [SpecterOps Blog](https://posts.specterops.io/)
- [Google Threat Analysis Group Blog](https://blog.google/threat-analysis-group/)
- [CrowdStrike Counter Adversary Operations Blog](https://www.crowdstrike.com/en-us/blog/category.counter-adversary-operations/)
- [Palo Alto Networks Unit 42 Blog](https://unit42.paloaltonetworks.com/unit-42-all-articles/)
- [Recorded Future Blog](https://www.recordedfuture.com/blog)
- [SEKOIA Threat Research Blog](https://blog.sekoia.io/category/threat-research/)
- [Wiz Research Blog](https://www.wiz.io/blog/tag/research)
## 🌟 精彩资源列表

originContent: > **If you are hungry for more resources, check out these awesome lists.**
translatedContent: > **如果你渴望更多资源，请查看这些精彩列表。**

originContent: - [Awesome Kubernetes Threat Detection](https://github.com/jatrost/awesome-kubernetes-threat-detection) - A list of Kubernetes threat detection resources.
translatedContent: - [Awesome Kubernetes Threat Detection](https://github.com/jatrost/awesome-kubernetes-threat-detection) - Kubernetes威胁检测资源列表。

originContent: - [Awesome Threat Intel Blogs](https://github.com/signalscorps/awesome-threat-intel-blogs) - A curated list of threat intelligence blogs and publications.
translatedContent: - [Awesome Threat Intel Blogs](https://github.com/signalscorps/awesome-threat-intel-blogs) - 精选威胁情报博客和出版物列表。

originContent: - [Awesome Detection Engineering](https://github.com/infosecB/awesome-detection-engineering) - A curated list of detection engineering resources.
translatedContent: - [Awesome Detection Engineering](https://github.com/infosecB/awesome-detection-engineering) - 精选检测工程资源列表。

originContent: - [Awesome Threat Detection](https://github.com/0x4D31/awesome-threat-detection) - A collection of threat detection resources.
translatedContent: - [Awesome Threat Detection](https://github.com/0x4D31/awesome-threat-detection) - 威胁检测资源合集。

originContent: - [Awesome Detection Engineer](https://github.com/st0pp3r/awesome-detection-engineer) - A list of resources for detection engineers.
translatedContent: - [Awesome Detection Engineer](https://github.com/st0pp3r/awesome-detection-engineer) - 检测工程师资源列表。

originContent: - [Blue Team Tools](https://github.com/A-poc/BlueTeam-Tools) - A collection of tools for blue teamers.
translatedContent: - [Blue Team Tools](https://github.com/A-poc/BlueTeam-Tools) - 蓝队工具合集。
